text: (ehet ovun samaga) kese nam (givisum) tibiya hækida? ovunva oba jayagrahanaya kalahot nam, oba (ovunta) gnatin yannada, (obatada,ovuntada atare æti) givisumada ganan gannema næta. tamange kata (uttaraya) magin (pamanak) obava trptiyata pat karannaha. namut ovunge hrdayan nam, (obagen) æt vannaha. ovungen vædideneku papatarayan vasayenma sitinnaha
